Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class CardController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.CardController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/card") public class CardController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling card related requests. It provides endpoints for getting all cards, filtering cards, getting a card by id or card number, updating a card status, creating a card, refilling a card, changing a card type, and deleting a card.

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Card>> getCards()
      This method is used to get all cards.
      Returns:
      A list of all cards.

    • filterCards

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/filter") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Card>> filterCards(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(value="sort",defaultValue="asc") String sort)
      This method is used to filter cards.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number.
      size - The size of the page.
      sort - The sort order.
      Returns:
      A page of filtered cards.

    • getCardById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> getCardById(@PathVariable("id") Long cardId)
      This method is used to get a card by id.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The id of the card.
      Returns:
      The card with the given id.

    • getCardByCardNumber

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/number") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> getCardByCardNumber(@RequestBody CardRequest request)
      This method is used to get a card by card number.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing the card number.
      Returns:
      The card with the given card number.

      This method is used to update a card status.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the card.

    • createCard

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> createCard(@PathVariable("id") Long userId, @RequestBody CardRequest cardRequest)
      This method is used to create a card.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      cardRequest - The request containing the currency and type of the card.
      Returns:
      The created card.

    • cardRefill

      @ResponseStatus(ACCEPTED) @PatchMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public void cardRefill(@PathVariable("id") Long cardId, @RequestBody CardRequest request)
      This method is used to refill a card.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The id of the card.
      request - The request containing the pin and balance of the card.

    • changeCardType

      This method is used to change a card type.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The id of the card.

    • deleteCard

      @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/from/{uid}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") public void deleteCard(@PathVariable("id") Long cardId, @PathVariable("uid") Long userId)
      This method is used to delete a card.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The id of the card.
      userId - The id of the user.
